pages.text: Despite their small size, German Spitz were originally bred as watch dogs.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these loyal dogs come in four different coats.
These dogs are most commonly found in snowy plains, ice spikes, and snowy taigas. They can also be found along snowy beaches and in meadows, and more rarely in jungles.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Salmon or Bacon Treat.
